generic.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
generic.load_failed: Failed to load data. Please try again.

network.timeout: Request timed out. Please check your connection and try again.
network.connection: Network error. Please check your internet connection.

http.400: Invalid request. Please check your input and try again.
http.401: You are not authorized. Please log in again.
http.403: You don't have permission to perform this action.
http.404: The requested resource was not found.
http.409: This operation conflicts with existing data.
http.422: The provided data is invalid. Please check and try again.
http.429: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
http.500: Server error. Please try again later.
http.502: Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
http.503: Service is currently under maintenance. Please try again later.
http.504: Request timed out. Please try again.
http.4xx: Client error ({{status}}). Please check your request and try again.
http.5xx: Server error ({{status}}). Please try again later.
